metadata.title: CVE-2016-9891 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in admin/media.php andadmin/media_item.php in Dotclear before 2.11 allows remote authenticatedusers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the upfiletitle ormedia_title parameter (aka the media title).

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
